summary.span: 在資料表中顯示資料來源的值，其中每個資料行各代表一個欄位，而每個資料列各代表一項記錄。

span.span: Displays the values of a data source in a table where each column represents a field and each row represents a record.

summary.span: 您可以利用 控制項選取、排序及編輯這些項目。

span.span: The control enables you to select, sort, and edit these items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [資料行欄位Column Fields](#column_fields) - [繫結至資料Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [資料作業Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來顯示資料表中的資料來源的值。The control is used to display the values of a data source in a table. 每個資料行代表一個欄位，而每個資料列都代表一筆記錄。Each column represents a field, while each row represents a record. 控制項支援下列功能：The control supports the following features: - 繫結至資料來源控制項，例如。Binding to data source controls, such as . - 內建的排序功能。Built-in sort capabilities. - 內建更新和刪除功能。Built-in update and delete capabilities. - 內建的分頁功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 內建的資料列選取功能。Built-in row selection capabilities. - 以程式設計方式存取物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性、 處理事件，等等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 多個索引鍵欄位。Multiple key fields. - 超連結資料行的多個資料欄位。Multiple data fields for the hyperlink columns. - 透過佈景主題和樣式的可自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through themes and styles. - 若要深入了解可在 ASP.NET 中的其他資料繫結控制項，請參閱[資料繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96)。To learn about the other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96). > [!NOTE] > 如果您已熟悉從.NET Framework 1.0 版中，控制項控制項是後續控制項。If you are familiar with the control from the .NET Framework version 1.0, the control is the successor to the control. ## 資料行欄位Column Fields 在每個資料行控制項由物件。Each column in the control is represented by a object. 根據預設，屬性設定為`true`，它會建立資料來源中的每個欄位的物件。By default, the property is set to `true`, which creates an object for each field in the data source. 每個欄位然後會轉譯為中的資料行順序的每個欄位會出現在資料來源控制項。Each field is then rendered as a column in the control in the order that each field appears in the data source. 您可以手動控制欄位會出現在哪一個資料行藉由設定控制屬性`false`然後定義您自己的資料行欄位集合。You can also manually control which column fields appear in the control by setting the property to `false` and then defining your own column field collection. 不同的資料行欄位的類型決定控制項中的資料行的行為。Different column field types determine the behavior of the columns in the control. 下表列出可用的不同的資料行欄位型別。The following table lists the different column field types that can be used. |資料行欄位類型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||顯示資料來源中的欄位的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source. 這是預設資料行類型的控制項。This is the default column type of the control.| ||顯示每個項目中的命令按鈕控制項。Displays a command button for each item in the control. 這可讓您建立的資料行的自訂按鈕控制項，例如 [新增] 或 [移除] 按鈕。This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.| ||顯示每個項目中的核取方塊控制項。Displays a check box for each item in the control. 這個資料行的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||顯示預先定義的命令按鈕可執行選取、 編輯或刪除作業。Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.| ||資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 這個資料行的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||顯示針對每個項目影像控制項。Displays an image for each item in the control.| ||顯示每個項目中的使用者定義內容控制項根據指定的範本。Displays user-defined content for each item in the control according to a specified template. 這個資料行的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料行的欄位。This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.| 若要以宣告方式定義資料行的欄位集合，請先加入開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To define a column field collection declaratively, first add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下來，列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料行欄位``標記。Next, list the column fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 指定的資料行加入集合的順序列出。The columns specified are added to the collection in the order listed. 集合會儲存所有資料行欄位控制項中，並可讓您以程式設計方式管理中的資料行欄位控制項。The collection stores all the column fields in the control and enables you to programmatically manage the column fields in the control. 明確宣告的資料行欄位可顯示與自動產生的資料行欄位一起使用。Explicitly declared column fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated column fields. 同時使用時，明確宣告資料行欄位會首先呈現，後面接著的自動產生的資料行欄位。When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields. > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的資料行欄位不會加入至集合。Automatically generated column fields are not added to the collection. ## 繫結至資料Binding to Data 控制項可以繫結至資料來源控制項 (例如控制項或控制項) 或任何資料來源集合中實作介面，例如， ， ，或其他集合型別。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結控制項至適當的資料來源類型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項，並可使用的資料來源控制項的功能，才能執行排序、 更新、 刪除和分頁。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, updating, deleting, and paging. 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 繫結至資料來源實作介面，以程式設計方式設定屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後呼叫方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 當使用此方法，控制項不提供內建排序、 update、 delete 和分頁功能。When using this method, the control does not provide built-in sort, update, delete, and paging functionality. 您需要提供此功能使用適當的事件。You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). > [!NOTE] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 可能的話，強烈建議，值經過 HTML 編碼，才能讓它們顯示在這個控制項 (類別預設的 HTML 編碼的值)。Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control (the class HTML-encodes values by default). ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## 資料作業Data Operations 控制項提供許多內建功能可讓使用者排序、 更新、 刪除、 選取及透過控制項中的項目頁面上。The control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to sort, update, delete, select, and page through items in the control. 當控制項所繫結至資料來源控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動排序、 更新和刪除功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, update, and delete functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控制項可以提供支援排序、 更新和刪除與其他類型的資料來源。The control can provide support for sorting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources. 不過，您必須提供適當的事件處理常式實作這些作業。However, you will need to provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations. 排序功能可以讓使用者排序中的項目相對於特定資料行的資料行標頭，即可控制。Sorting allows the user to sort the items in the control with respect to a specific column by clicking on the column's header. 若要啟用排序，屬性`true`。To enable sorting, set the property to `true`. 當功能的按鈕時，會啟用自動更新、 刪除和選取項目功能或分別按一下資料行 欄位與 「 編輯 」、 「 刪除 」 及 「 選取 」 的命令名稱。The automatic updating, deleting, and selection functionalities are enabled when a button in a or column field, with a command name of "Edit", "Delete", and "Select", respectively, is clicked. 控制項可自動將新增如果資料行 欄位和編輯、 刪除或選取按鈕， ，或屬性設定為`true`分別。The control can automatically add a column field with an Edit, Delete, or Select button if the , , or property is set to `true`, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 將資料錄插入到資料來源不直接支援控制項。Inserting records into the data source is not directly supported by the control. 不過，並將記錄插入使用控制項搭配`DetailsView`或`FormView`控制項。However, it is possible to insert records by using the control in conjunction with the `DetailsView` or `FormView` control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱或分別。For more information, see or , respectively. 而不是在相同的時間，顯示資料來源中的所有記錄控制項可以自動分成記錄頁面。Instead of displaying all the records in the data source at the same time, the control can automatically break the records up into pages. 若要啟用分頁，屬性`true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 控制項是根據儲存在中的資訊回傳上重新建立。The control is re-created on postback based on the information that is stored in . 如果控制項包含或與屬性設定為`true`，然後在屬性也必須設定為`true`確保並行資料作業，例如更新和刪除，套用至適當的資料列。If the control includes a or a with the property set to `true`, then the property must also be set to `true` to ensure that concurrent data operations, such as updates and deletes, apply to the appropriate row. ## 自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface 您可以自訂的外觀藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||中的交替資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. 當設定這個屬性時，資料列會顯示交替設定和設定。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||正在編輯中的資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the row being edited in the control.| ||空白資料列中顯示的樣式設定控制當資料來源不包含任何記錄。The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||頁尾資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the footer row of the control.| ||標頭資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the header row of the control.| ||頁面巡覽列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the pager row of the control.| ||中的資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the data rows in the control. 當屬性也設定時，資料列會顯示交替設定和設定。When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||在選取的資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the selected row in the control.| ||樣式，設定為依排序的資料行資料中控制項。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 當設定此樣式時，樣式 （例如，反白顯示資料行） 會套用到資料格，以遞增順序排序資料時。When this style is set, the style (for example, highlighted column) is applied to cells when the data is sorted in ascending order.| ||樣式，設定為依排序的資料行資料中控制項。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 當設定此樣式時，箭號表示遞增排序的資料所在的標頭控制當資料以遞增順序排序。When this style is set, an arrow indicating the data is sorted ascending is placed on the header of the control when the data is sorted in ascending order.| ||樣式，設定為依排序的資料行資料中控制項。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 當設定此樣式時，樣式 （例如，反白顯示資料行） 會套用到資料格，以遞減順序排序資料時。When this style is set, the style (for example, highlighted column) is applied to cells when the data is sorted in descending order.| ||樣式，設定為依排序的資料行資料中控制項。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 當設定此樣式時，箭頭指向向下所在的標頭時以遞減順序排序資料。When this style is set, an arrow pointing down is placed on the header of the when the data is sorted in descending order.| 您也可以顯示或隱藏的控制項的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出可控制哪些部分要顯示或隱藏的屬性。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏的頁尾區段控制項。Shows or hides the footer section of the control.| ||顯示或隱藏的標頭區段控制項。Shows or hides the header section of the control.| ## 事件Events 控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。The control provides several events that you can program against. 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This enables you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至控制項中的不同頁面, 時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different page in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ||發生於按一下的資料列的 [取消] 按鈕前,控制項結束編輯模式。Occurs when a row's Cancel button is clicked, but before the control exits edit mode. 此事件通常用來停止取消作業。This event is often used to stop the canceling operation.| ||按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control. 此事件通常用於在控制項中按下按鈕時執行工作。This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||建立新的資料列中時，就會發生控制項。Occurs when a new row is created in the control. 若要修改的資料列的內容時建立的資料列通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to modify the contents of a row when the row is created.| ||資料列中的資料繫結時，就會發生控制項。Occurs when a data row is bound to data in the control. 此事件通常用於資料繫結的資料列時修改資料列的內容。This event is often used to modify the contents of a row when the row is bound to data.| ||發生於按一下的資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕前,控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。This event is often used to cancel the deleting operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [編輯] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項進入編輯模式之前)。Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用來取消編輯作業。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [更新] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項更新資料列之後)。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [更新] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項更新資料列之前)。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the row. 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理選取作業之後)。Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the control handles the select operation. 在控制項中選取一個資料列之後執行的工作通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to perform a task after a row is selected in the control.| ||按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理選取作業之前)。Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用來取消選取作業。This event is often used to cancel the selection operation.| ||按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 控制項處理排序作業之後)。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用於在使用者按一下排序資料行的超連結後執行的工作。This event is commonly used to perform a task after the user clicks a hyperlink to sort a column.| ||按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 控制項處理排序作業之前)。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. 若要取消排序作業，或執行自訂排序常式，通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882). 下列範例會示範如何使用控制項來顯示 Microsoft SQL Server 中有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫的 Customers 資料表中的值。The following example demonstrates how use the control to display the values from the Customers table of the AdventureWorksLT sample database in Microsoft SQL Server. 使用擷取的值控制項。The values are retrieved using a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 分頁可讓您顯示的內容區塊 （chunk） 的控制項。Paging enables you to display the contents of the control in chunks. 在頁面上的項目數目由屬性。The number of items on a page is determined by the property. 一般來說，每個資料列中的資料來源會讀取每次控制項移到不同的頁面。Normally, every row in the data source is read every time the control moves to a different page. 這可能會耗用大量的資源時非常大的資料來源中的項目總數。This can consume a lot of resources when the total number of items in the data source is very large. 自訂分頁可讓您讀取只要您需要從資料來源的單一頁面的項目。Custom paging allows you to read just the items you need for a single page from the data source. 若要啟用自訂分頁，同時設定和屬性`true`。To enable custom paging, set both the and properties to `true`. 中的處理常式設定事件，屬性設為新的頁面索引值，設定屬性的資料來源中的項目總數來設定要傳回目前的頁面上和呼叫所需的資料列的資料來源 方法。In a handler for the event, set the property to the new page index value, set the property to the total number of items in the data source, set the data source to return only the rows needed for the current page, and call the method. 屬性可讓控制項來決定總頁數，這個值通常由自動讀取所有的項目。The property enables the control to determine the total number of pages; this value is normally determined automatically by reading all of the items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是在相同的時間，顯示資料來源中的所有記錄控制項可以自動分成記錄頁面。Instead of displaying all the records in the data source at the same time, the control can automatically break the records up into pages. 如果資料來源支援的分頁功能，控制項可以充分利用，並提供內建的分頁功能。If the data source supports the paging capability, the control can take advantage of that and provide built-in paging functionality. 分頁功能可以搭配任何支援的資料來源物件介面或支援的資料來源分頁功能。The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface or a data source that supports paging capability. 若要啟用分頁功能，將屬性`true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 根據預設，控制項一次將 10 筆記錄顯示在頁面上。By default, the control displays 10 records on a page at a time. 您可以變更顯示在頁面上，藉由設定的記錄數目屬性。You can change the number of records displayed on a page by setting the property. 若要判斷顯示資料來源內容所需的分頁總數，請使用屬性。To determine the total number of pages required to display the data source contents, use the property. 您可以使用，以判斷目前所顯示的頁面索引屬性。You can determine the index of the currently displayed page by using the property. 啟用分頁時，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列將包含控制項，可讓使用者巡覽至其他頁面。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages. 您可以使用來控制的設定 （例如頁面巡覽區顯示模式，在時間和頁面巡覽區控制項的文字標籤顯示的頁面連結數目） 的頁面巡覽列屬性。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text labels) by using the property. 頁面巡覽列可以藉由設定顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部屬性。The pager row can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control by setting the property. 您也可以選取其中四個內建的頁面巡覽區顯示模式設定屬性。You can also select from one of four built-in pager display modes by setting the property. 下表描述的內建的顯示模式。The following table describes the built-in display modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|一組分頁控制項包含上一個和下一步 按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|一組分頁控制項，包含先前，接下來，第一個和最後一個按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|一組分頁控制項，包含用於直接存取頁面的編號連結按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly. 此為預設模式。This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|一組編號，第一個和最後一個連結按鈕所組成的重新編頁控制項。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列 （包括其背景色彩、 字型色彩和位置），使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the property. > [!NOTE] > 控制項自動隱藏頁面巡覽列，當資料來源包含只有一個分頁的記錄。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains only one page of records. 控制項也可讓您定義的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本。The control also enables you to define a custom template for the pager row. 如需有關如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區列範本的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about creating a custom pager row template, see . 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用分頁發生時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至控制項中的不同頁面, 時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different page in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，來以宣告方式啟用中的分頁功能控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to declaratively enable the paging feature in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowPaging/CS/gridviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowPaging/VB/gridviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當支援排序的資料來源控制項繫結至控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動排序功能。When a data source control that supports sorting is bound to the control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sorting functionality. 當控制項繫結至資料來源藉由設定屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須提供排序的功能使用事件。When the control is bound to a data source by setting the property programmatically, you must provide the sorting functionality by using the event. > [!NOTE] > 不同的資料來源有不同的需求，以啟用其排序功能。Different data sources have different requirements for enabling their sorting capabilities. 若要決定的需求，請參閱特定資料來源的文件。To determine the requirements, see the documentation for the specific data source. 若要啟用排序，屬性`true`。To enable sorting, set the property to `true`. 排序已啟用時，與每個資料行欄位的標題文字其屬性組會顯示為連結按鈕。When sorting is enabled, the heading text for each column field with its property set is displayed as a link button. > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的資料行欄位的屬性會自動填入。The property for an automatically generated columns field is automatically populated. 如果您定義您自己的資料行，透過集合，您必須設定屬性每個資料行; 否則資料行不會顯示 [連結] 按鈕的標頭中。If you define your own columns through the collection, you must set the property for each column; otherwise, the column will not display the link button in the header. 針對資料行導致中的項目，按一下 [連結] 按鈕来排序的控制項為基礎的排序運算式。Clicking the link button for a column causes the items in the control to be sorted based on the sort expression. 通常，排序運算式就是會導致的資料行中顯示的欄位名稱控制項相對於該資料行排序。Typically, the sort expression is simply the name of the field displayed in the column, which causes the control to sort with respect to that column. 若要排序多個欄位，請使用包含以逗號分隔的欄位名稱清單的排序運算式。To sort by multiple fields, use a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names. 您可以決定排序運算式，控制套用利用屬性。You can determine the sort expression that the control is applying by using the property. 如果按一下重複的資料行連結按鈕切換遞增和遞減順序之間的排序方向。Clicking a column's link button repeatedly toggles the sort direction between ascending and descending order. 若要判斷目前的排序方向，請使用屬性。To determine the current sort direction, use the property. 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用排序發生時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when sorting occurs. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 控制項處理排序作業之後)。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用於在使用者按一下排序資料行的超連結後執行的工作。This event is commonly used to perform a task after the user clicks a hyperlink to sort a column.| ||按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 控制項處理排序作業之前)。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. 若要取消排序作業，或執行自訂排序常式，通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以啟用排序中控制使用自動產生的資料行時。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable sorting in a control when automatically generated columns are used. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewAllowSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSorting/CS/gridviewallowsortingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewAllowSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSorting/VB/gridviewallowsortingvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以啟用排序中負責控制何時定義集合。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable sorting in a control when a collection is defined. 映像也以程式設計方式加入標頭來指出排序方向排序之資料行。An image is also programmatically added to the header of the column being sorted to indicate the sort direction. 您必須提供自己的映像，如這個範例才能運作。You must provide your own images for this sample to work. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewAllowSortingColumns#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSortingColumns/CS/GridViewAllowSortingColumnscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewAllowSortingColumns#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSortingColumns/VB/GridViewAllowSortingColumnsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料中交替資料列的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of alternating data rows in a control. 當設定這個屬性時，資料列會顯示交替設定和設定。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來以宣告方式定義的替代中的資料列的樣式屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to declaratively define the style for alternating data rows in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowStyle/CS/gridviewrowstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowStyle/VB/gridviewrowstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`、物件自動建立的每個資料來源中的欄位。When the property is set to `true`, an object is automatically created for each field in the data source. 中的資料行，即會顯示每個欄位順序欄位出現在資料來源控制項。Each field is then displayed as a column in the control in the order that the fields appear in the data source. 此選項提供便利的方式，以顯示每個欄位中的資料來源;不過，您的有限控制如何自動產生的資料行 欄位會顯示和行為。This option provides a convenient way to display every field in the data source; however, you have limited control of how an automatically generated column field is displayed or behaves. 而非讓控制項自動產生的資料行欄位中，您可以設定，以手動定義的資料行欄位屬性`false`，然後再建立自訂`Columns`集合。Instead of letting the control automatically generate the column fields, you can manually define the column fields by setting the property to `false` and then creating a custom `Columns` collection. 除了繫結資料行的欄位，您也可以顯示按鈕資料行欄位中，核取方塊資料行欄位、 命令欄位、 超連結資料行欄位、 影像欄位或您自己自訂的範本為基礎的資料行欄位。In addition to bound column fields, you can also display a button column field, a check box column field, a command field, a hyperlink column field, an image field, or a column field based on your own custom-defined template. 您也可以結合明確宣告的資料行自動產生的資料行欄位的欄位。You can also combine explicitly declared column fields with automatically generated column fields. 同時使用時，明確宣告資料行欄位會首先呈現，後面接著的自動產生的資料行欄位。When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields. 自動產生的繫結資料行欄位不會加入至集合。Automatically generated bound column fields are not added to the collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`並設定屬性模型型別，控制項所產生。If you set this property to `true` and set the property to a model type, controls are generated. 如果您未設定屬性，控制項所產生。If you do not set the property, controls are generated. 如果您不想控制項，您可以使用下列選項：If you do not want controls, you have the following options: - 設定屬性`null`中`Page_Load`事件處理常式。Set the property to `null` in the `Page_Load` event handler. 在此情況下，控制項所產生。In that case, controls are generated. - 撰寫自訂程式碼來自動產生欄位，藉由建立並指派自己類別並將它的執行個體指派給控制項。Write custom code to automatically generate fields by creating and assigning your own class and assigning an instance of it to the control. - 請設定 為 `false`。Set to `false`. 在此情況下，會產生任何欄位，並和您必須手動指定欄位使用的控制項，例如或。In that case, no fields are generated, and you must manually specify fields using controls such as or . - 請勿設定 屬性。Do not set the property. 在此情況下，控制項所產生。In that case, controls are generated. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，會自動建立繫結的欄位中的資料行資料來源中的每個欄位的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically create bound field columns in a control for each field in the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當支援刪除的資料來源控制項繫結至控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動刪除功能。When a data source control that supports deleting is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 刪除資料的資料來源控制項，它必須設定為刪除的資料。For a data source control to delete data, it must be configured to delete data. 若要設定資料來源控制項來刪除記錄，請參閱特定資料來源控制項的文件。To configure a data source control to delete records, see the documentation for the specific data source control. 當屬性設定為`true`，資料行 (由物件) 與 [刪除] 按鈕，針對每個資料列會自動加入至控制項。When the property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a object) with a Delete button for each data row is automatically added to the control. 從資料來源，按一下 [刪除] 按鈕的資料列永久地移除該記錄。Clicking the Delete button for a row permanently removes that record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 您也必須設定屬性來識別索引鍵欄位或自動刪除功能運作的資料來源的欄位。You must also set the property to identify the key field or fields of the data source for the automatic deleting feature to work. 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用資料列遭到刪除時，執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is deleted. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於按一下的資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕前,控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。This event is often used to cancel the deleting operation.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用自動刪除功能控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the automatic deleting feature of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewEdit/CS/editorders.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewEdit/VB/editorders.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當支援更新的資料來源控制項繫結至控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新功能。When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. > [!NOTE] > 資料來源控制項更新資料，它必須設定為更新資料。For a data source control to update data, it must be configured to update data. 若要設定資料來源控制項來更新記錄，請參閱特定資料來源控制項的文件。To configure a data source control to update records, see the documentation for the specific data source control. 當屬性設定為`true`，資料行 (由物件) 使用 [編輯] 按鈕，針對每個資料列會自動加入至控制項。When the property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a object) with an Edit button for each data row is automatically added to the control. 按一下 [編輯] 按鈕的資料列時，會將該資料列放在編輯模式。Clicking an Edit button for a row puts that row in edit mode. 當資料列處於編輯模式時，不是唯讀的資料列中的每個資料行 欄位會顯示適當的輸入的控制項，例如控制欄位的資料類型。When a row is in edit mode, each column field in the row that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 這可讓使用者修改欄位的值。This allows the user to modify the field's value. 按一下時，編輯 按鈕也會取代的更新 按鈕和 取消 按鈕。When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 按一下 [更新] 按鈕更新資料來源中的資料列的值變更，並傳回要顯示模式的資料列。Clicking the Update button updates the row in the data source with any value changes and returns the row to display mode. 按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有的值變更，並傳回要顯示模式的資料列。Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the row to display mode. > [!NOTE] > 您可以程式設計的方式將一個資料列處於編輯模式下設定屬性的資料列索引。You can programmatically put a row in edit mode by setting the property with the index of the row. 若要以程式設計方式結束編輯模式，請設定屬性設為-1。To programmatically exit edit mode, set the property to -1. 內建的更新功能時，您必須設定以逗號分隔的欄位清單的內容名稱，以識別主索引鍵欄位或資料來源的欄位; 否則內建的更新功能將無法更新正確的記錄。When using the built-in updating functionality, you must set the property with a comma-separated list of field names to identify the primary key field or fields of the data source; otherwise, the built-in updating functionality will not be able to update the correct record. 使用自動產生欄位資料行時 (藉由設定屬性`true`)、控制會自動確定對應到欄位或欄位中指定的自動產生的欄位資料行屬性是唯讀狀態。When using automatically generated field columns (by setting the property to `true`), the control automatically ensures that the automatically generated field columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. 您可以控制的資料列處於編輯模式下使用外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of a row that is in edit mode by using the property. 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用資料列更新時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is updated. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於按一下的資料列的 [取消] 按鈕前,控制項取消編輯模式。Occurs when a row's Cancel button is clicked, but before the control cancels out of edit mode. 此事件通常用來停止取消作業。This event is often used to stop the canceling operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [編輯] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項進入編輯模式之前)。Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用來取消編輯作業。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [更新] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項更新資料列之後)。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||按一下資料列的 [更新] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項更新資料列之前)。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the row. 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用自動編輯功能控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the automatic editing feature of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewEdit/CS/editorders.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewEdit/VB/editorders.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，資料行 (由物件) 使用選取的按鈕，針對每個資料列會自動加入至控制項。When the property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a object) with a Select button for each data row is automatically added to the control. 針對資料列選取控制項中的該資料列，請按一下 [選取] 按鈕，它會設定屬性的資料列索引。Clicking the Select button for a row selects that row in the control, which sets the property to the index of the row. 若要擷取物件，表示選取的資料列，使用屬性。To retrieve the object that represents the selected row, use the property. 您也可以取得選取的記錄主索引鍵值，藉由屬性。You can also get the primary key value for the selected record by using the property. 屬性包含的值中指定的索引鍵欄位屬性。The property contains the values of the key fields specified in the property. > [!NOTE] > 您可以透過程式設計方式選取資料列藉由設定屬性。You can programmatically select a row by setting the property. 若要取消選取資料列的項目，設定屬性設為-1。To cancel the selection of a row, set the property to -1. 您可以使用，以控制選取的資料列的外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the selected row by using the property. 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用選取的資料列時，執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is selected. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理選取作業之後)。Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the control handles the select operation. 在控制項中選取一個資料列之後執行的工作通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to perform a task after a row is selected in the control.| ||按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理選取作業之前)。Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用來取消選取作業。This event is often used to cancel the selecting operation.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用的自動選取功能控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the automatic selection feature of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/CS/gridviewselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/VB/gridviewselectvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，允許使用者瀏覽至其他頁面，並可顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，表示內的底部頁面巡覽區列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理下方的頁面巡覽區列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已呈現，否則控制項將會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取內的底部頁面巡覽區列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the bottom pager row in a control. 屬性用來擷取頁面巡覽區列控制項。The property is used to retrieve a control from the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字控制項。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control. 您指定的文字會提供具有可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的資料表描述的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible. 您也可以指定用於轉譯 HTML 標題項目使用的位置屬性。You can also specify the position at which to render the HTML caption element by using the property. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的標題控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption for a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`|標題項目與資料表底端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Left`|標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`|未設定標題項目對齊。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Right`|標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Top`|標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定為`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`，會使用瀏覽器的預設值。When this property is set to `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, the default value of the browser is used. 若要指定 HTML caption 元素的文字，請使用屬性。To specify the text for the HTML caption element, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性以指定的標題項目控制項與控制項的頂端對齊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the caption element for a control is aligned with the top of the control. summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格控制項具有相同的寬度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有其他資料格都有這個儲存格的寬度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column have this cell width. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有其他資料格都有這個儲存格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row have this cell height. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來以宣告方式設定儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的空間數量。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to declaratively set the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCellPadding/CS/gridviewcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCellPadding/VB/gridviewcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的相鄰資料格之間的間距控制項。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the control. 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 儲存格間距是一致的整個控制項。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control. 不能指定個別資料格的資料列或資料行之間的間距。Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定此屬性的值大於 0，然後將屬性相鄰的資料格的框線之間顯示儲存格框線的值，顯示間隔。If you set this property to a value greater than 0 and then set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情況下，屬性控制的差距大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來以宣告方式設定儲存格之間的空間數量控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to declaratively set the amount of space between the cells of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免命名衝突，當控制項的多個執行個體以多個資料列的轉譯控制項，ASP.NET 產生唯一每個執行個體的值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered in multiple rows of a control, ASP.NET generates a unique value for each instance. 您指定如何藉由設定產生值屬性。You specify how the value is generated by setting the property. 如果您設定屬性，ASP.NET 會產生藉由附加的尾碼，衍生自所指定的資料欄位。If you set the property to , ASP.NET will generate the by appending a suffix that is derived from the data field or fields that are specified in . 如果未設定，尾碼是一組序號。If is not set, the suffix is a sequential number.

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，其表示 控制項中的資料行欄位。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the column fields in a control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中的所有資料行欄位。

span.span: A that contains all the column fields in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行欄位表示中的資料行控制項。A column field represents a column in a control. 屬性 （集合） 用來儲存明確宣告的資料行之所有欄位，以取得轉譯控制項。The property (collection) is used to store all the explicitly declared column fields that get rendered in the control. 您也可以使用以程式設計方式管理的資料行的欄位集合的集合。You can also use the collection to programmatically manage the collection of column fields. > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告資料行欄位可用於與自動產生的資料行欄位搭配使用。Explicitly declared column fields can be used in combination with automatically generated column fields. 同時使用時，明確宣告資料行欄位會首先呈現，後面接著的自動產生的資料行欄位。When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields. 自動產生的資料行欄位不會加入至集合。Automatically generated column fields are not added to the collection. 資料行欄位會顯示在順序的資料行欄位會出現在控制項集合。The column fields are displayed in the control in the order that the column fields appear in the collection. 下表顯示不同的資料行欄位的類別衍生自類別，並可用於集合。The following table shows the different column field classes that derive from the class and can be used in the collection. |資料行欄位類型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||顯示資料來源中的欄位的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source. 這是預設資料行類型的控制項。This is the default column type of the control.| ||顯示每個項目中的命令按鈕控制項。Displays a command button for each item in the control. 這可讓您建立的資料行的自訂按鈕控制項，例如 [新增] 或 [移除] 按鈕。This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.| ||顯示每個項目中的核取方塊控制項。Displays a check box for each item in the control. 這個資料行的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||顯示預先定義的命令按鈕可執行選取、 編輯或刪除作業。Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.| ||資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 這個資料行的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||顯示針對每個項目影像控制項。Displays an image for each item in the control.| ||顯示每個項目中的使用者定義內容控制項，根據指定的範本。Displays user-defined content for each item in the control, according to a specified template. 這個資料行的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料行的欄位。This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.| 雖然您可以程式設計方式加入至資料行欄位集合，會比較容易清單以宣告方式中的資料行欄位控制，然後使用顯示或隱藏每個資料行欄位的每個資料行欄位的屬性。Although you can programmatically add column fields to the collection, it is easier to list the column fields declaratively in the control and then use the property of each column field to show or hide each column field. 如果資料行欄位的屬性設定為`false`，資料行不會顯示在控制項和資料行的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。If the property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client. 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料行的資料，加入欄位名稱屬性。If you want the data for a column that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以填入集合以宣告方式。The following example demonstrates how to populate the collection declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewColumnFields#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewColumnFields/CS/gridviewcolumnfieldscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewColumnFields#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewColumnFields/VB/gridviewcolumnfieldsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法將資料繫結至資料來源控制項。Use the method to bind data from a data source to the control. 這個方法會解析所有資料繫結運算式在使用中的範本中的控制項。This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control. 方法會自動呼叫，如果屬性控制指的是有效的資料來源控制項。The method is called automatically if the property of the control refers to a valid data source control. 而不是以手動方式呼叫方法，您可以使用模型繫結來搭配您藉由設定控制屬性的傳回資料的方法名稱。Instead of manually calling the method, you can use model binding with your control by setting the property to the name of a method that returns data for the . 接著會自動填入從選取的方法傳回的資料。The is then automatically populated with the data that is returned from the select method. 模型繫結可簡化您的程式碼使用的資料。Model binding can simplify your code for working with data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For more information, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用繫結至資料來源方法控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to bind a data source to a control. summary.span: 取得或設定陣列，這個陣列包含 控制項中所顯示項目的主索引鍵欄位名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

value.span: 陣列，包含 控制項中所顯示項目的主索引鍵欄位名稱。

span.span: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定欄位或欄位代表資料來源的主索引鍵。Use the property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source. 您只應設定此屬性來唯一識別每個資料列; 所需的欄位例如，如果整數值的唯一識別碼資料行識別每個資料列。You should only set this property to the field or fields that are required to uniquely identify each row; for example, the ID column if an integer value uniquely identifies each row. 您必須設定屬性自動更新和刪除功能運作的控制項。You must set the property in order for the automatic update and delete features of the control to work. 若要指定要更新或刪除的資料列，這些索引鍵欄位的值會傳遞至資料來源控制項。The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to specify the row to update or delete. 如果您要擷取的資料更新時，機碼值，或刪除資料列中，使用`Keys`屬性中的其中一個或類別。If you need to retrieve the data key value when updating or deleting a row, use the `Keys` property of either the or class. 例如，`e.Keys[0]`保存的值中的第一個資料索引鍵或事件處理常式。For example, `e.Keys[0]` holds the value of the first data key in a or event handler. 如果您需要選取一個資料列時，擷取資料的金鑰值，請使用屬性。If you need to retrieve the data key value when a row is selected, use the property. 當設定屬性，則控制項就會自動填入其提供便利的方式來存取每個資料列的主索引鍵欄位或指定的欄位的值集合。When the property is set, the control automatically populates its collection with the values from the specified field or fields, which provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each row. > [!NOTE] > 控制項儲存這些索引鍵欄位值中的控制項狀態。The control stores these key field values in the control state. 如果這些值會包含機密資訊，強烈建議您藉由設定啟用檢視狀態加密屬性`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。If these values contain sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you enable view-state encryption by setting the property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`. 當您使用自動產生欄位資料行 (藉由設定屬性`true`)、控制項可確保中指定的資料行對應到欄位或欄位屬性是唯讀狀態。When you use automatically generated field columns (by setting the property to `true`), the control makes sure that the columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. 如果資料行欄位的屬性設定為`false`，資料行不會顯示在控制項和資料行的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。If the property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client. 如果您想要看不到可供用戶端的資料行的資料，加入欄位名稱屬性。If you want the data for a column that is not visible to be available to the client, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定資料來源的索引鍵欄位。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the key field of the data source. 在範例中，`DataKeyNames`屬性`GridView`標記中的項目會指定兩個索引鍵欄位，使用逗號來分隔名稱。In the example, the `DataKeyNames` attribute of the `GridView` element in markup specifies two key fields by using a comma to separate the names. 若要執行此範例中，建立具有下列網站：To run this example, create a Web site that has the following: - 有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫和名為連接字串的連線`AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`。A connection to the AdventureWorksLT sample database and a connection string that is named `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`. 如需如何設定有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫的資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫 ASP.NET 開發](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT sample database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356). - LINQ 到 SQL 資料內容類別，以名為`AdventureWorksLTDataClassesDataContext`。A LINQ-to-SQL data context class that is named `AdventureWorksLTDataClassesDataContext`. 資料內容必須 SalesOrderDetails 資料表的類別。The data context must have a class for the SalesOrderDetails table. 如需如何建立 LINQ 到 SQL 類別資訊，請參閱[LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For information about how to create LINQ-to-SQL classes, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewEdit/CS/editorders.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewEdit/VB/editorders.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要編輯之資料列的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the row to edit.

value.span: 要編輯的資料列之以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the row to edit.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示沒有任何資料列正在編輯。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is being edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以零為起始的資料列索引 （第一個資料列是資料列零）。The row index is zero-based (the first row is row zero). 這個屬性通常使用只在下列案例中，其中包含特定的事件處理常式：This property is typically used only in the following scenarios, which involve handlers for specific events: - 您想要控制項以開啟特定資料列的編輯模式中的頁面會顯示第一次。You want the control to open in edit mode for a specific row the first time that the page is displayed. 若要這樣做，您可以設定屬性中的處理常式事件類別或控制項。To do this, you can set the property in the handler for the event of the class or of the control. - 您想要知道哪一個資料列已在編輯過之後已更新的資料列。You want to know which row was edited after the row was updated. 若要這樣做，您可以擷取從資料列索引屬性事件處理常式。To do this, you can retrieve the row index from the property in the event handler. - 您要繫結控制項至資料來源，藉由設定屬性以程式設計的方式。You are binding the control to a data source by setting the property programmatically. 在此情況下，您必須設定屬性和事件處理常式。In this case you must set the property in the and event handlers. 如果您設定屬性在回傳後或在引發的事件處理常式晚於事件，控制項可能會不進入編輯模式，針對指定的資料列。If you set the property after a postback or in handlers for events that are raised later than the event, the control might not enter edit mode for the specified row. 如果您讀取其他事件處理常式中的此屬性的值，索引不會保證以反映正在編輯的資料列。If you read the value of this property in other event handlers, the index is not guaranteed to reflect the row that is being edited. 若要判斷哪個資料列的使用者已按一下**編輯**按鈕或中的超連結，然後再控制項進入編輯模式，您可以擷取從資料列索引屬性中的物件事件處理常式。To determine which row the user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink in before the control enters edit mode, you can retrieve the row index from the property of the object in the event handler. 若要避免控制項進入編輯模式之後使用者已按一下,**編輯**按鈕或超連結，將屬性物件`true`中事件處理常式。To prevent the control from entering edit mode after a user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink, set the property of the object to `true` in the event handler. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷哪一個資料列已更新之後尚未編輯的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which row was updated after it was edited in a control. 您可以顯示的訊息指出已成功更新。A message is displayed to indicate that the update was successful. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRows#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRows/CS/gridviewrowscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRows#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRows/VB/gridviewrowsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制正在編輯中的資料列的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the row being edited in a control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性可定義正在編輯中的資料列的自訂樣式控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to define a custom style for the row being edited in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的 null 資料列的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the null row in a control. 繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄時，會顯示 null 的資料列。The null row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以宣告方式指定淺藍色背景和 null 資料列的紅色字型。The following example demonstrates how to set the property declaratively to specify a light blue background and a red font for the null row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白資料列會顯示在控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。The empty data row is displayed in a control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records. 您可以使用，以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列屬性。You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the property. 若要指定空白資料列的自訂範本，先將``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用屬性。To control the style of the empty data row, use the property. 或者，設定為空的資料列使用內建的 UI而不是這個屬性的屬性。Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the property instead of this property. 如需如何以程式設計方式存取您宣告空的資料範本中的控制項的資訊，請參閱[如何： 存取伺服器控制項的 ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3)。For information about how to programmatically access controls that you declare in an empty data template, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3). > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個和設定的屬性，屬性會優先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義自訂的範本，空白資料列會顯示當控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for the empty data row displayed when a control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的水平對齊頁面內控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of a control within the page. 下表列出不同的水平對齊樣式。The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles. |對齊值Alignment value|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|水平對齊尚未設定控制。The horizontal alignment of the control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|控制項是在頁面上靠左對齊。The control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|控制項置於頁面。The control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|控制項是在頁面上靠右對齊。The control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|控制項對齊頁面的左、 右邊界。The control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用對齊屬性頁面右側的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to align a control on the right side of a page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時前,，會引發事件控制項負責的分頁作業。The event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出應該取消的分頁作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要取消的分頁作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件取消的分頁作業，如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至另一個頁面時控制項處於編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the paging operation if the user attempts to navigate to another page when a control is in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewPageIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewPageIndexChanging/CS/gridviewpageindexchangingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewPageIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewPageIndexChanging/VB/gridviewpageindexchangingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 控制項中頁面巡覽區按鈕的屬性。

value.span: 的參考，其可讓您設定 控制項中頁面巡覽區按鈕的屬性。

span.span: A reference to the that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的設定中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 頁面巡覽列會顯示啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，並且包含允許使用者在控制項中的不同頁面導覽控制項。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `PagerSettings-Mode`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.Mode`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.Mode`). 頁面巡覽區列的顯示模式和自訂文字或影像的導覽控制項，通常包含一般設定。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以宣告方式。The following example demonstrates how to set the property declaratively. 它會設定為藍色，並分別淺藍色的字型和頁面巡覽區列的背景。It sets the font and background for the pager row to blue and light blue, respectively. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowPaging/CS/gridviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowPaging/VB/gridviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面巡覽列會顯示在控制啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為 true)。A pager row is displayed in a control when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to true). 頁面巡覽區列包含允許使用者瀏覽至控制項中的不同頁面的控制項。The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽區的資料列的使用者介面 (UI)，您可以定義自己的 UI 使用屬性。Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定，它會覆寫內建的頁面巡覽列 UI。When the property is set, it overrides the built-in pager row UI. 若要指定頁面巡覽區列的自訂範本，先將``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列，使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row, use the property. 通常，按鈕控制項就會加入至頁面巡覽區範本，進行分頁作業。Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations. 分頁作業使用的按鈕控制項時，控制項執行其`CommandName`按一下屬性設定為 「 頁面 」。The control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked. 按鈕的`CommandArgument`屬性會決定要執行的分頁作業的類型。The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform. 下表列出支援的命令引數值控制項。The following table lists the command argument values supported by the control. |`CommandArgument` 值`CommandArgument` value|描述Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| |「 下一步"Next"|巡覽至下一頁。Navigates to the next page.| |「 Prev""Prev"|瀏覽至上一頁。Navigates to the previous page.| |"First""First"|巡覽至第一頁。Navigates to the first page.| |「 最後 」"Last"|巡覽至最後一頁。Navigates to the last page.| |整數值Integer value|巡覽至指定的頁面數目。Navigates to the specified page number.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區範本，可讓使用者瀏覽控制使用控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom pager template that allows the user to navigate through a control using a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面呼叫方法發生回傳事件時，就會引發的適當事件控制項。The page calls the method when a postback event occurs that raises the appropriate events for a control. 這個呼叫發生在頁面生命週期中載入和變更的通知完成後，但尚未發生之前。This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs. 已經實作這個方法，以建立物件引發的事件。This method has been implemented to create a object for the events that are raised. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充控制項。This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the control.

summary.span: 按一下處於編輯模式之資料列的 [取消] 按鈕時發生 (但在資料列結束編輯模式之前)。

span.span: Occurs when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下資料列處於編輯模式下的 [取消] 按鈕時，會引發事件，但該資料列結束之前編輯模式。The event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如停止取消作業，會讓資料列處於不良狀態，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止取消作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To stop the cancel operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用使用者取消的更新作業時，顯示取消訊息的事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display a cancellation message when the user cancels the update operation of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/CS/gridviewrowcancellingeditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/VB/gridviewrowcancellingeditvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用取消更新作業，當以程式設計方式設定資料來源的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the update operation when the data source is set programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/GridViewRowEditing2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/GridViewRowEditing2VB.aspx#2)]

Public Custom Event RowCommand As GridViewCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 按一下 控制項中的按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a button is clicked in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中按下按鈕時，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when a button is clicked in the control. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 按鈕內控制項也可以叫用的某些內建控制項的功能。Buttons within a control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control. 若要執行這些作業之一，設定`CommandName`下表中的值的其中一個按鈕的屬性。To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table. |`CommandName` 值`CommandName` value|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| |[取消]"Cancel"|取消編輯作業，並傳回唯讀模式的控制項。Cancels an edit operation and returns the control to read-only mode. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |"Delete""Delete"|刪除現有的記錄。Deletes the current record. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |[編輯]"Edit"|將目前的記錄放入處於編輯模式。Puts the current record in edit mode. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |「 頁面 」"Page"|執行分頁作業。Performs a paging operation. 設定`CommandArgument`"First"，"持續 」 按鈕、 下一步 」、 「 Prev"，或執行頁碼，以指定的分頁作業類型的屬性。Sets the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 選取 」"Select"|選取目前的記錄。Selects the current record. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |"Sort""Sort"|排序控制項。Sorts the control. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 更新 」"Update"|更新資料來源中目前的資料錄。Updates the current record in the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 雖然按一下按鈕，在上表所列時，會引發事件，則建議您使用作業的資料表中列出的事件。Although the event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷命令名稱並按之按鈕的命令引數。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked. > [!NOTE] > 若要判斷引發該事件的資料列的索引，請使用傳遞給事件的事件引數的屬性。To determine the index of the row that raised the event, use the property of the event argument that is passed to the event. 類別會自動填入具有適當的索引值的屬性。The class automatically populates the property with the appropriate index value. 其他的命令按鈕，您必須手動設定命令按鈕的屬性。For other command buttons, you must manually set the property of the command button. 例如，您可以設定至`<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>`時控制項有沒有分頁已啟用。For example, you can set the to `<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>` when the control has no paging enabled. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882). 下列範例示範如何使用要加入的客戶名稱事件控制權傳輸至控制按一下資料列的 [新增] 按鈕時。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to add the name of a customer from a control to a control when a row's Add button is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/CS/gridviewrowcommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/VB/gridviewrowcommandvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用按一下資料列的按鈕時，更新的產品價格的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to update the price of a product when a row's button is clicked. 這個範例有啟用分頁功能控制項和集合屬性控制項至適當的資料列索引。This example has the paging functionality enabled for the control and sets the property of the control to the appropriate row index. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCommmand#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/CS/gridviewrowcommand2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCommmand#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/VB/gridviewrowcommand2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 建立 控制項中的資料列時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a row is created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，必須建立在控制項中的每個資料列的物件。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each row in the control. 就會引發事件時每個資料列中建立控制項。The event is raised when each row in the control is created. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您存取正在建立的資料列的屬性。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being created. 若要存取特定的儲存格的資料列中，使用屬性物件。To access a specific cell in the row, use the property of the object. 您可以判斷哪一個資料列型別 （標頭資料列、 資料列，等等） 建立使用屬性。You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件存放區中建立的資料列索引屬性資料列中包含的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to store the index of the row being created in the property of a control contained in the row. 這可讓您判斷所包含之資料列索引控制當使用者按一下按鈕。This enables you to determine the index of the row that contains the control when the user clicked the button. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCreated/CS/gridviewrowcreatedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCreated/VB/gridviewrowcreatedvb.aspx#1)]

Public Custom Event RowDataBound As GridViewRowEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::GridViewRowEventHandler ^ RowDataBound;

summary.span: 資料列繫結至 控制項中的資料時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a data row is bound to data in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個資料列必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。Before the control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source. 資料資料列時，就會引發事件 (由物件) 中的資料繫結控制項。The event is raised when a data row (represented by a object) is bound to data in the control. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如修改繫結的資料列，此事件發生時的值。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您存取所要繫結的資料列的屬性。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being bound. 若要存取特定的儲存格的資料列中，使用屬性中所含物件屬性物件。To access a specific cell in the row, use the property of the object contained in the property of the object. 您可以判斷哪一個資料列型別 （標頭資料列、 資料列，等等） 使用繫結屬性。You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being bound by using the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882). 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以修改資料來源中欄位的值，它會顯示在之前控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to modify the value of a field in the data source before it is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/CS/gridviewrowdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/VB/gridviewrowdataboundvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 按一下資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項刪除資料列之後)。

span.span: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下的資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後時，會引發事件控制項刪除資料列。The event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the row. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性物件。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property of the object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以檢查刪除作業的結果。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to check the result of the delete operation. 若要對使用者指出作業是否成功，會顯示訊息。A message is displayed to indicate to the user whether the operation succeeded. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDeleted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDeleted/CS/gridviewrowdeletedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDeleted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDeleted/VB/gridviewrowdeletedvb.aspx#1)]
