.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler RowDeleting
Public Custom Event RowDeleting As GridViewDeleteEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::GridViewDeleteEventHandler ^ RowDeleting;

summary.span: 按一下資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項刪除資料列之前)。

span.span: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕按一下時前,控制項刪除資料列。The event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the row. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消刪除作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消刪除作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 您也可以使用操作和集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。You can also manipulate the and collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消刪除作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the delete operation. 此頁面包含顯示一份客戶姓名和地址中有提供 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的控制項。The page contains a control that displays a list of customer names and addresses from the AdventureWorksLT database. 當使用者按一下**刪除**連結的資料列的處理常式事件會檢查使用者嘗試刪除資料列中顯示之人員的姓氏。When the user clicks the **Delete** link for a row, the handler for the event checks the last name of the person displayed in the row that the user is trying to delete. 如果最後一個名稱為"河狸 」，已取消刪除作業，並會顯示錯誤訊息。If the last name is "Beaver", the delete operation is canceled, and an error message is displayed. 任何其他名稱，繼續進行刪除作業，並在刪除資料列。For any other name, the delete operation proceeds and the row is deleted. 事件處理常式使用屬性物件來尋找使用者嘗試刪除的資料列。The event handler uses the property of the object to find the row that the user is trying to delete. 此範例會檢查的內容集合。The example examines the contents of the collection. 如果您想要的值比對索引鍵的值，您可以檢查集合改為。If the value you want to compare to is a key value, you could examine the collection instead. CustomerAddress 資料表，而不是 Customer 資料表中刪除資料列以保持簡單的範例。Rows are deleted from the CustomerAddress table instead of the Customer table in order to keep the example simple. 控制項顯示的結果聯結三個資料表： 客戶、 位址和 CustomerAddress。The control shows the result of joining three tables: Customer, Address, and CustomerAddress. 當刪除資料列時，對應的 CustomerAddress資料列就會消失。When a CustomerAddress row is deleted, the corresponding row disappears. 參考完整性條件約束會使其中實際刪除資料列從 Customer 資料表中更複雜的範例程式碼。Referential integrity constraints would make the code for an example that actually deletes rows from the Customer table more complex. 如需如何設定與 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫 ASP.NET 開發](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356). [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDeleting/CS/gridviewrowdeleting.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDeleting/VB/gridviewrowdeleting.aspx#1)]

public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::GridViewEditEventHandler ^ RowEditing;

summary.span: 按一下資料列的 [編輯] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項進入編輯模式之前)。

span.span: Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發資料列的 [編輯] 按鈕按一下時前,控制項進入編輯模式。The event is raised when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消編輯作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消編輯作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消的編輯作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用將一個資料列處於編輯模式時以程式設計方式設定資料來源的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to put a row in edit mode when the data source is set programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/GridViewRowEditing2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/GridViewRowEditing2VB.aspx#2)] 下列範例示範如何使用取消編輯作業，如果使用者嘗試在美國公司編輯記錄的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the editing operation if the user attempts to edit the record for a company in the United States. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/gridviewroweditingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/gridviewroweditingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 HTML 中，可以與一個資料列或資料行相關聯的資料表標頭。In HTML, the header of a table can be associated with either a row or a column. 設定來指定方向`scope`屬性``項目。The direction is specified by setting the `scope` attribute of the `` elements. 控制項具有內建的標頭資料列，可以藉由設定顯示屬性`true`。The control has a built-in header row that can be displayed by setting the property to `true`. 您也可以選擇指定的標頭資料行 (通常是第一個或最後一個資料行中的控制項) 藉由設定這個屬性。You can also optionally specify a header column (usually the first or last column in the control) by setting this property. 當設定這個屬性時，對應至指定的欄位名稱的資料行中的所有資料格會轉譯為``項目。When this property is set, all cells in the column that corresponds to the specified field name are rendered as `` elements. > [!NOTE] > 指定的資料行就會被視為標頭，雖然， ，和屬性不會套用至標頭資料行。Although the specified column is treated like a header, the , , and properties do not apply to the header column. 預設呈現``保留項目，以水平方式轉譯為粗體和置中的文字。The default rendering of the `` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally. 開發人員可以覆寫行為``項目使用階層式樣式表。Developers can override the behavior of the `` element using a cascading style sheet. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於繫結欄位。This property works only with bound fields. 它不適用於範本欄位。It does not work with template fields. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示中的標頭資料行控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display a header column in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性 （集合） 用來存放區中的資料列控制項。The property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a control. 控制項就會自動填入藉由建立集合物件資料來源中的每一筆記錄，然後將每個物件加入至集合。The control automatically populates the collection by creating a object for each record in the data source and then adding each object to the collection. 這個屬性通常用於存取控制項中的特定資料列或逐一查看整個資料列的集合。This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows. > [!NOTE] > 只有當資料列具有其屬性設定為`DataControlRowType.DataRow`會儲存在集合。Only rows with their property set to `DataControlRowType.DataRow` are stored in the collection. 代表頁首、 頁尾和頁面巡覽區的資料列的物件不包含在集合中。The objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用存取正在編輯中的資料列集合控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the collection to access the row being edited in a control. 更新資料列之後，會顯示訊息，指出更新成功。After a row is updated, a message is displayed to indicate that the update was successful. span.span: Gets a reference to the object that enables you to set the appearance of the data rows in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的資料列的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the data rows in a control. 當屬性也設定時，資料列會顯示交替設定和設定。When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `RowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來以宣告方式定義中的項目資料列的樣式屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to declaratively define the style for the item rows in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下的資料列的 [更新] 按鈕，但之後時，會引發事件控制項更新資料列。The event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性物件。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property of the object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以檢查更新作業的結果。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to check the result of the update operation. 若要對使用者指出作業是否成功，會顯示訊息。A message is displayed to indicate to the user whether the operation succeeded. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowUpdated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowUpdated/CS/gridviewrowupdatedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowUpdated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowUpdated/VB/gridviewrowupdatedvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發資料列的 [更新] 按鈕按一下時前,控制項更新資料列。The event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the row. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消更新作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消更新作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 若要取消更新作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the update operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 您也可以使用操作， ，和集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。You can also manipulate the , , and collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source. 使用這些集合的常見方式是將 HTML 編碼再將它們儲存在資料來源中，使用者所提供的值。A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source. 這有助於防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。This helps to prevent script injection attacks. > [!NOTE] > ，和集合會自動填入時才控制項透過繫結至資料屬性。The , and collections are automatically populated only when the control is bound to data by using the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以程式設計方式設定資料來源時，更新資料來源物件中的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to update the values in the data source object when the data source is set programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則控制項會自動建立控制項使用的值或指定的欄位或欄位的值中的每個資料列的物件。When the property is set, the control automatically creates a object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields. 物件接著會加入至控制項的集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 一般來說，屬性用來擷取特定資料列中的物件控制項。Normally, the property is used to retrieve the object for a specific data row in the control. 不過，如果您只需要擷取物件的目前選取的資料列，您可以直接使用較快速的屬性。However, if you just need to retrieve the object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the property as a shortcut. > [!NOTE] > 這是擷取相同所指定索引處物件屬性從集合。This is the same as retrieving the object at the index specified by the property from the collection. 您也可以使用直接擷取目前選取的資料列的資料值的屬性。You can also use the property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly. 如果您要建立物件，並想要存取的第一個欄位以外的索引鍵欄位，請使用索引屬性屬性物件。If you are creating a object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed property in the property of the object. 範例如下所示。An example is shown below. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷選取的資料列中的資料值控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a control. A控制項用來顯示訂單詳細資料資料表的 Northwind 資料庫中的記錄。A control is used to display records from the Order Details table of the Northwind database. 記錄中選取了時從 Products 資料表之產品的詳細資料會顯示在控制項，控制項。When a record is selected in the control, the details of the product from the Products table are displayed in a control. ProductID 是中的第二個索引鍵名稱控制項。ProductID is the second key name in the control. 若要存取的第二個索引鍵的 GridView1.SelectedDataKey[1 值] 做為的物件控制控制項。To access the second key, the value of GridView1.SelectedDataKey[1] is used as the for the object of the control of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 時的資料列選取按一下按鈕時，但之後會引發事件控制處理選取的作業。The event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the control handles the select operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如目前選取的資料列，更新狀態標籤時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a status label with the currently selected row, whenever this event occurs. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件 以顯示客戶的名稱選取資料列內控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display the name of the customer in the selected row of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/CS/gridviewselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/VB/gridviewselectvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理選取作業之前)。

span.span: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時的資料列選取按一下按鈕時，之前引發事件控制處理選取的作業。The event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消選取作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷使用者所選取的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消選取作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled. 若要取消選取作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the selection operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消選取作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a select operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/CS/gridviewselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/VB/gridviewselectvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制選取的資料列中的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the selected row in a control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性可定義選取之資料列中的自訂樣式控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to define a custom style for the selected row in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/CS/gridviewselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/VB/gridviewselectvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來以程式設計的方式排序控制使用指定的排序運算式和方向。Use the method to programmatically sort the control using the specified sort expression and direction. 排序運算式會指定用來排序的資料行。The sort expression specifies the column or columns with which to sort. 若要排序多個資料行，建立包含以逗號分隔的欄位名稱清單的排序運算式。To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names. 排序方向會指出是否執行排序以遞增或遞減的順序。The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order. 這個方法通常使用於您需要排序控制項從受控制，例如從不同的控制項在頁面上。This method is commonly used when you need to sort the control from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. 這個方法也通常用來以程式設計方式設定的預設排序次序控制第一次呈現時。This method is also commonly used to programmatically set a default sort order for the control when it is first rendered. 呼叫這個方法也會引發和事件。Calling this method also raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來以程式設計的方式排序控制多個資料行。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically sort the control by multiple columns. summary.span: 按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 控制項處理排序作業之前)。

span.span: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時按一下的超連結以排序資料行，但之前引發事件控制項負責排序作業。The event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消排序作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定資料行的排序運算式，並指出應該取消選取作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled. 若要取消選取作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the selection operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何以程式設計方式起始排序作業的資訊，請參閱方法。For information about how to programmatically initiate a sort operation, see the method. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件來執行排序功能時控制項繫結至物件藉由設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to perform the sorting functionality when the control is bound to a object by setting the property programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/CS/gridviewsorting2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/VB/gridviewsorting2vb.aspx#2)] 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以取消排序作業。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a sorting operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/CS/gridviewsortingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/VB/gridviewsortingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定如何選取的資料列何時會保存控制項處於分頁模式。You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the control is in paging mode. 根據預設，資料列選取範圍以資料列索引。By default, row selection is based on row index. 每個頁面上選取相同的資料列 （例如，第三個資料列）。The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page. 或者，您可以啟用選取的資料列的資料索引鍵為基礎的持續性。Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row. 在此情況下，如果您選取第 1 頁上的資料列 3，而且您移動到第 2 頁，會不選取任何資料列在第 2 頁。In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2. 如果您移回至頁面 1，3 的資料列已選取。If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected. 若要啟用這項功能，請將此屬性設定為`true`。To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5 版的 ASP.NET，只以資料列索引為基礎選取資料列。In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index. 根據預設，ASP.NET 4 中的資料列選取範圍根據回溯相容性的索引。By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他頁面，並可以顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，代表在最上層頁面巡覽列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in a control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立的最上層頁面巡覽區列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the top pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作最上層頁面巡覽列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已呈現，否則控制項將會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取的最上層頁面巡覽區列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the top pager row in a control. 屬性用來擷取頁面巡覽區列控制項。The property is used to retrieve a control from the pager row. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewTopPagerRow/CS/gridviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewTopPagerRow/VB/gridviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來以程式設計方式更新資料來源中指定索引處的記錄。Use the method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source. 這個方法通常使用於您要更新的記錄從外部控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。This method is commonly used when you need to update a record from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 可以呼叫這個方法，僅針對目前處於編輯模式下，資料列或資料列，其中包含雙向資料繫結的輸入的控制項。This method can be called only for the row that is currently in edit mode, or for a row that contains a two-way data-bound input control. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要指定是否要將頁面驗證執行更新作業之前，請使用`causesValidation`參數。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 呼叫這個方法也會引發和事件。Calling this method also raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來以程式設計方式更新中的記錄控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically update a record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否控制項呈現其標頭中的資料列存取的格式。Use the property to specify whether the control renders its header row in an accessible format. 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 根據預設，這個屬性的值是`true`使用轉譯控制項標頭和``資料表標頭資料格標記。By default, the value of this property is `true` and the header for the control is rendered using `` table header cell tags. 此外，`scope="col"`屬性加入至資料表標頭，指定資料行中的所有資料格套用標頭。In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column. 預設呈現``保留項目，以水平方式轉譯為粗體和置中的文字。The default rendering of the `` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally. 開發人員可以覆寫的樣式``項目使用階層式樣式表。Developers can override the style of the `` element using a cascading style sheet. 如果這個屬性的值為`false`，使用轉譯控制項標頭``資料表儲存格標籤。If the value of this property is `false`, the header for the control is rendered using `` table cell tags. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性停用可存取的標頭。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to disable the accessible header.
